#### Question 1

Import and initial tidying of the *Johnson Elementary Project Data*.

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)

johnson.elem.data <- read_csv(here("Data", 
                                   "Johnson Elementary ELA Project.csv"), 
                              skip = 4, 
                              col_names = c("Room", "ID", "Tardies;Absences",
                                            "Q1", "Q2", "Q3", "Q4"))
                      

johnson.elem.data
```


Further tidying of the *Johnson Elementary Project Data*.

```{r}
johnson.elem.data %>% 
  fill(Room)

drop_na(johnson.elem.data) #how to make this work
  
johnson.elem.data

johnson.elem.data %>%
  separate(johnson.elem.data,'Tardies;Absences', 
           into = c("Tardies", "Absences"),
           convert = TRUE)

```
